Module de.chojo.sadu.queries
Package de.chojo.sadu.queries.api.execution.writing

Interface CalledSingletonQuery

All Known Implementing Classes:
CalledSingletonQueryImpl
public interface CalledSingletonQuery
Represents a query that can be executed as a singleton call.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    ManipulationResult
    delete()
    Deletes rows from the table based on the specified query.
    InsertionResult
    insert()
    Inserts a row into the database table represented by the initial symbol of the containing class, and returns the result of the manipulation operation.
    InsertionResult
    insertAndGetKeys()
    Inserts a row into the database table represented by the initial symbol of the containing class, and returns the result of the manipulation operation.

    map(RowMapping<V> row)
    Maps the result of the query to a Reader of type V by applying the provided ThrowingFunction.

  • Method Details

    • map

      <V> Reader<V> map(RowMapping<V> row)
      Maps the result of the query to a Reader of type V by applying the provided ThrowingFunction.
      Type Parameters:
      V - the type of objects in the Reader
      Parameters:
      row - the function to apply on the result row
      Returns:
      a Reader of type V

    • mapAs

      <V> Reader<V> mapAs(Class<V> clazz)
      Maps the current result set to the specified class type and returns a Reader object.
      Type Parameters:
      V - the type of the class to map the result set to
      Parameters:
      clazz - the class type to map the result set to
      Returns:
      a Reader object with the result set mapped to the specified class type

    • mapAs

      <V> Reader<V> mapAs(Class<V> clazz, MapperConfig config)
      Maps the result of a query to the specified class using the provided MapperConfig.
      Type Parameters:
      V - the type to map the query result to
      Parameters:
      clazz - the class to map the query result to
      config - the MapperConfig to use for mapping
      Returns:
      a Reader object that can be used to retrieve the mapped result

    • insertAndGetKeys

      InsertionResult insertAndGetKeys()
      Inserts a row into the database table represented by the initial symbol of the containing class, and returns the result of the manipulation operation.
      Returns:
      The result of the manipulation operation as a InsertionResult object.

    • insert

      InsertionResult insert()
      Inserts a row into the database table represented by the initial symbol of the containing class, and returns the result of the manipulation operation.
      Returns:
      The result of the manipulation operation as a InsertionResult object.

    • update

      ManipulationResult update()
      Updates the data in the database based on the provided query.
      Returns:
      The result of the manipulation operation as a ManipulationResult object.

    • delete

      ManipulationResult delete()
      Deletes rows from the table based on the specified query.
      Returns:
      The result of the manipulation operation as a ManipulationResult object.
